data.name: Dark invasion VR: Doomsday Demo
data.detailed_description:
Get ready to swing your arms and run through an immersive horror shooter adventure in VR. Dive into the beginning of the Dark Invasion and prepare to survive the first demo episode of "Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday"!

Let us introduce you to "Dark Invasion VR" . A VR horror shooter with a story driven campaign and quests. Blast your way through zombies, monsters, mutants and aliens.

A meteorite is heading towards earth and nobody knows what is going on, the city gets overrun by zombies, monsters and aliens. In the Steam Demo Version you play as John Beggart, a former college student and now part of a reconstruction team that is working in an old bunker that survived the 2nd world war.

John shivers as he enters that place and does not know that his world would soon fall over. He remembers how Karen got lost in this place of forsaken tales. They never found her again... till today..

As the apocalypse begins John is inside of the Bunker, he fights his way with all might and all kinds of weapons through the underground basement and takes force against the undead army of the dark invasion.
Take control about the situation and fight as John in VR and manage to fulfill your quest to get out of that forsaken place.

Quests, Zombies and guns!

-Fast paced VR horror shooter
-Press forward on your controller to walk and swing your arms holding the button for forward to run
-Adventure elements and quests
-Fight with melee, ranged weapons or use grenades
-Story driven campaign
-Best horror 3D surround sound
-Dismemberment, gore and blood
-Meet Zombies, Aliens, Mutants, Demons, Karen, the Mumbling Man and more
-Free locomotion
-Room scaling

We are going to develop a episodic gameplay experience:

Episode 1: Bunker Doomsday is in the final version to be planned in the intro and 10 more maps.
Episode 2:The Dead Peoples City is planned to be separated into 10 different maps including a school and a police station.
Episode 3:The alien ship. Another 10 maps and find here more answers why all this is happening.

Each Episode is going to include 2 boss fights.

In the current Demo you can play the shooting range to learn the controls and 3 maps of Episode 1 for free.

A brutal VR horror, shooter with story, zombies and quests is waiting for your audience.

data.short_description: Get ready to swing your arms and run through an immersive horror shooter adventure in VR. Dive into the beginning of the Dark Invasion and prepare to survive the first demo episode of "Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday"! Quests, Zombies and guns!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence, blood, gore and dismemberment. Some people could get feared by the horrific mutants, zombies, monsters and aliens.
